## Get files and process them.
```{r process_files, eval = T}
files <- params$files 
db <- params$db

if (length(files) == 0) {
  print("No files to process.")
} else if (length(db) == 0){
  print("No database name given.")
} else {
  cat(sprintf("Processing %d files...\n", length(files)))
  mych <- pitdb_open(db)
  
  if (mych == -1) {
    print("Failed to open database.")
  } else {  
    files %>% purrr::walk(function(.x, ch = mych) {pitdb_load_file(ch = ch, filename = .x, parse_summary = TRUE, ignore_insert_errors = TRUE)})
    pitdb_close(mych)
  }
}
```
